column3: 小主 你什么都不吃

column6: My Lady, you haven't eaten anything. Please eat something.

column3: 娘娘 敦亲王福晋来了
column6:
Your Highness, State Prince Dun's wife,
Lady Borjigin is here.
I have only met her once.

column3: 这么个生病又失宠的嫔妃
column6:
Why would she come to visit a sick
concubine who is out of favor?
Ask her to return to her affairs.
Yes.
I wasn't expecting Your Ladyship.

column3: 今日原是去给太后请安的
column6: I came to pay my respects to the Empress Dowager,
and also Her Majesty the Empress.
Please sit.

column3: 不想听说娘娘身子不适
column6: I heard Your Highness is unwell
so I came for a visit.
I'm ashamed to be seen this way by Your Ladyship.
I shouldn't be having visitors while I'm ill.
I didn't expect that Your Ladyship would visit.
Please pardon my discourtesy.

column3: 不想才三四个月的时间
column6: I cannot believe that in just three or four months ...
Your Highness has ...
I appreciate Your Ladyship's concern.
I brought a box of ginseng with me today.

column3: 希望娘娘可以收下 补养身体
column6:
I hope Your Highness will accept it

and that it will help with your recovery.
I thank Your Ladyship.

column3: 妾身知道王爷脾气向来不好
column6: Prince Dun is known to have a short temper.
If he has ever offended Your Highness,
or if Your Highness distrusts this gift,
I understand if Your Highness prefers to discard the ginseng.

column3: 怎么会 福晋多心了
column6: Why would I?
Your Ladyship is overthinking.

column3: 今日不是奉旨而来 不敢久留
column6: I was not summoned for a visit
so I shouldn't stay longer.

column3: 他日妾身再来拜访娘娘
column6: I'll visit Your Highness again another day.
I hope Your Highness will soon recover your health.
Jin Xi, please see Her Ladyship out.
Yes.
My Lady.

column3: 小主 这参要扔了吗
column6: My Lady, the ginseng ...
Should we dispose of it?
Although her husband is not friendly to us

column3: 但这人参也是她一番美意
column6: the ginseng is a sign of her goodwill.
Send it to Dr. Wen.

column3: 看看太医院用不用得到
column6: Perhaps it can be used by the Imperial Infirmary.
Yes.
I've been ill for so long.

column3: 不想却还是她还肯来看我
column6: I never would have expected she would want to visit me.
People's hearts run hot and cold.

column3: 所幸惠贵人和敬妃娘娘
不还是在关心着小主吗
column6:
Fortunately, Lady Vertu and Consort Estime

also care about Your Highness very much.
You should let servants do this for me.
It's my pleasure doing this for Your Majesty.
I'm happy that this
can make Your Majesty more comfortable.

"Within his court, if a King does not have
law-abiding officials and worthy counselors,"

"and if abroad there are not hostile states
or other foreign aggression,"
"his kingdom will generally come to ruin."

column3: 然后知生于忧患 死于安乐
column6:
"Hence, in calamity, one thrives;
 in comfort and ease, one perishes.”

Mencius speaks the truth.
 [respected disciple of Confucius]
Wealth and comfort corrode one’s resolve.

King Gou Jian “slept on brushwood
and tasted gall” to stoke his revenge.

column3: 居安思危 未雨绸缪
column6:
“Think of danger in times of peace.”
“Shutter the windows before it rains.”
This was the way of the ancient rulers.
Do you agree?
I do.
Your Majesty has spoken so much...
Have some water to soothe your throat.
If Concubine Sourire were here,
she would converse at length with me.
Sourire is well-read and talented.

column3: 谈论古今 最能适宜
column6: Her insights into history are always thoughtful.
I heard she fell ill with the advent of autumn.

column3: 你可去看过 怎么样
column6: Have you visited her? How is she?

column3: 姐姐的病说到底是心病
column6: Sourire's illness is in the heart, after all.
If Your Majesty visits her,
she will recover quickly.
It's not that I don't want to go ...

column3: 近乡情更怯 朕是不敢
column6: "The closer to home you get, the more insecure you become."
I dare not visit her.
How is her neck?
It got much better.
The scratches didn't leave any scars.

column3: 那就好 女子容色最重要
column6: That's good.
A woman's appearance matters the most.

column3: 皇上 臣妾有一事想请皇上做主
column6: Your Majesty, I have a humble request.
Rise and speak.
Yes.
Since Sourire lost her child,

column3: 心中困苦难当 积郁成疾
column6: she has been living in unbearable grief
and that caused her illness.

column3: 让姐姐见一见家人也好
column6: If Your Majesty is not able to visit her,
it would be nice to let her family visit.

column3: 也好倾诉心中困苦 以求发泄
column6: It would give her a chance to talk about her sadness
and let out her feelings.
The pain of losing her child ...
will be comforted by her family.

column3: 只是她心中怨恨朕与年妃
column6:
But she harbors resentment towards
Consort Nian and I.
If she talks to her family,

column3: 痛上加痛 耿耿于怀
column6: that would fuel her resentment rather than quelling it.
That would not be good for her recovery.

column3: 皇上思虑周全 臣妾不及
column6:
Your Majesty has considered every angle.
I did not think of that.
You are like a sister to her.
There's nothing wrong with advocating on her behalf.

column3: 皇上方才说人恒过 然后能改
column6: Your Majesty was reading
“One errs, and then one corrects.”
I know that sentence.

column3: 臣妾在皇上面前屡屡有不足之处
column6: I often make mistakes in front of Your Majesty
and I have strived to rectify them.
I hope that...
Your Majesty appreciates my effort.
You understand the sentence

column3: 莞嫔这样聪明 却不明白
column6: but the smart Concubine Sourire does not.
It doesn't matter whether she understands it or not.
But she must remember one thing:
Your Majesty is the Emperor

column3: 皇上永远是对的就是了
column6: and Your Majesty is always right.

column3: 你晚上别回去了 留下来陪朕吧
column6: Don't return to your palace tonight. Stay with me.

column3: 皇上忘了 您约了十七爷进宫
column6: Your Majesty,
you must have forgotten Lord XVII is invited

column3: 要一起去看董其昌的字帖
column6: to appreciate Dong Qichang's calligraphy books.
His Lordship has already arrived.
He's not a busy man.
He will stay at the Hall of Converging Light
and I will see him another day.

column3: 你身上穿的这个衣裳是蜀锦裁的
column6: Is the dress you're wearing made of Shu Brocade?
Your Majesty surely remembers

column3: 您上回赏了臣妾一匹蜀锦
column6: that the Shu Brocade you awarded me

column3: 让内务府赶着为臣妾做了新衣
column6:
was sent to the Household Department
by you to make me a new dress.

column3: 蜀锦 你穿着很好看
column6: The Shu Brocade ...
looks very good on you.

column3: 回头内务府有多少朕都赏你
column6:
When the Household Department receives
more pieces, I'll give them all to you.
I thank Your Majesty
My Lady has been ill only a short time,

column3: 咱们碎玉轩可真是门可罗雀
column6:
but it's become it's so deserted here,
"one could catch sparrows".
People reveal their true nature over time.
Now I realize,

column3: 那些曾经和咱们走得近的人
column6: those people who were once close

column3: 无非都是利用小主的恩宠罢了
column6: were taking advantage of My Lady's high favor.
His Majesty rarely comes to the harem these days

except for visiting the Empress and
the Palace of Prolonging Happiness.

column3: 且不说利用两个字难听
column6: I don't like to say "take advantage",
but we'll be at a dead-end if we have no value to anyone.

column3: 你这话够难听 倒是也不差
column6: Your words are harsh,
but it’s the truth.
In the palace,

column3: 有利用价值的人才能活下去
column6: only those who are useful can survive.

column3: 好好做一个可利用的人
column6: We have to become useful,

column3: 安于被利用 才能利用别人
column6: and content with being used.
Then we can use others.
Discussing it won’t help us.
We must think of a solution.

column3: 如今安贵人最能见皇上
column6: Although Noble Lady An sees His Majesty most frequently now,
she is not a person we can count on.

column3: 苏培盛又是个奴才也递不上话
column6: Su Peisheng is just a servant, not able to weigh in.

column3: 既能说得上话又是咱们能见的人
column6:
It has to be someone whose words
carry weight and who we are able to meet
so they can talk some sense into My Lady.

column3: 我听说十七爷现在住在宫里
column6: I heard that Lord XVII is living in the Palace now.
How would that help?

column3: 十七爷怎么是咱们能见的呀
column6: His Lordship isn't someone we can meet.
You have been here for half a day.
Why have you been looking at me like this?
I’m just wondering

what it would look like
if you had truly lost faith in His Majesty.
Meizhuang, you think...

column3: 我对皇上还没有灰心吗
column6: I have not lost faith in His Majesty?
What do you think?
If you had actually lost faith in His Majesty,

column3: 又怎会缠绵在病中而不能自拔
column6: you would have already recovered from your illness.

column3: 与其如此 皇上不来看你
column6: Instead of sitting here,
you could visit His Majesty even if he does not come,

column3: 省得这里冷清得和冷宫一样
column6: so this palace wouldn’t be lifeless like the Cold Palace.
His Majesty will come if he is willing.

column3: 他若不来 我强求又是何必
column6: If he’s not,
I can't force that to happen.
You are not like I am.

column3: 我与皇上的情分本来就浅
column6: His Majesty has much deeper affection for you.

column3: 他将我禁足 不闻不问
column6:
He confined me, and didn't want
to hear or ask about me.

That helped me to understand
he is fickle and unreliable.

column3: 即便像现在他对我可有可无
column6: Now he treats me as if I was invisible,
but I don’t really mind it.
But you are different.

column3: 因为我对皇上的心意比你更多吗
column6: Because I have more affection than you do
for His Majesty?
If you had no affection for him,
you would be just like me.
Not a thing he does or says would sadden you.
In fact...
You already understand.

column3: 皇上对你并非了无心意啊
column6: His Majesty has not lost his affection for you.

column3: 怎么说陵容都曾与我们交好
column6: But still, Lingrong was close to us.
Even though her words mismatched her deeds,

column3: 去与她争宠 论长短
column6: do I really have to compete with her for His Majesty's favor?

column3: 何况皇上终究喜欢陵容更多一些
column6: And now, His Majesty favors Lingrong more than me.

column3: 你得宠时帮过陵容争宠
column6: You helped her gain favor when you were in favor,
but has she ever helped you when she's in favor?

column3: 她若帮你 你又何须争宠
column6: If she helps you, you won't need to compete for favor.
If she doesn’t,

column3: 你可是准备这样失宠至终
column6:
do you plan to stay out of favor
until the end of your days?
And, His Majesty,

column3: 不过是今儿喜欢你多一些
column6: he will have a favored concubine one day
and a different favored the next.
It will always change.

column3: 不就是比别人多一点点的喜欢吗
column6: We women in the palace are just fighting for slightly more favor than the others.
If your heart has truly died for His Majesty,

column3: 就不会浪费时间在这儿伤心了
column6: you wouldn't be wasting your time on grief.

column3: 姐姐 我很傻是不是
column6: Meizhuang...
I’m so stupid, aren’t I?
In this palace,

column3: 有一丝纯粹的感情和温情
column6: I had hoped for a shred of love and tenderness.

column3: 比起其他的事最不该期待的
column6: I should have expected that least of all.
Huan’er...

column3: 这宫里伤心的人已经太多了
column6: There are already too many broken hearts in the palace.
Don't be another one of them.
I understand.

column3: 好了 我要去向太后请安
column6: All right.
I must pay respects to the Empress Dowager.
I’ll see you tomorrow.

column3: 姐姐最近常去向太后请安吗
column6: Do you often visit Her Majesty recently?
Since my recovery, I don't feel for His Majesty as before.

column3: 如今陵容专宠 后宫也难见皇上
column6:
Now that Lingrong is exclusively in favor,
and His Majesty barely comes to the harem,
I sought a way to ensure my status.
Her Majesty must be very fond of you.
Her Majesty is unwell.

column3: 我左右无事 多去陪陪太后也好
column6:
Spending my time with her is better than
being an idle person in the palace.
I will go now.

column3: 有劳姑姑辛苦了 让我来喂吧
column6: You have worked hard, Madam.
Allow me to do this for you.

column3: 你一来她们就轻松多了
column6: Whenever you're here, you make their work much easier.
You do so many tasks and errands for them.
I rarely have the chance to spend time with Your Majesty.

column3: 您就让臣妾多尽尽孝心吧
column6: Please allow me to fulfill my filial duty.

column3: 你还难得 你日日来哀家跟前
column6: Rarely?
You come here every single day.
If Your Majesty is troubled by my coarseness,
I won’t dare to come again.

column3: 你这孩子性子温和又细心
column6: You’re mild-natured and careful.
I enjoy your company.

column3: 太后不嫌弃臣妾就好了
column6: I'm honored that Your Majesty says so.
Careful, it was quite hot.
I appreciate your time,
but I have to remind you.

column3: 有空啊 多陪陪皇帝
column6: You should spend more time with the Emperor if possible.

column3: 富察贵人和莞嫔的孩子都没了
column6: Lady Fuca and Concubine Souire have lost their children.

column3: 皇帝心里难过 最要人陪着
column6: The Emperor is in grief and he needs someone to be there for him.

column3: 其实臣妾倒想着解铃还须系铃人
column6: I believe “who tied the bell should be the one to untie it”.

column3: 皇上伤心是因为莞嫔失了孩子
column6: His Majesty is sad because of Concubine Souire’s loss.

column3: 若是莞嫔能时时陪着皇上

column6: It would be good if she could spend more time with His Majesty.

column3: 如果两个人有解不开的心结
column6: If that is a knot in the heart that cannot be untied,

column3: 凑在一块儿反而会更僵
column6: it would make things even worse if they are together.
Things will not work out

column3: 只有两个人中的一个想明白了
column6: until one of the two thinks through it
and makes the first move.
Yes.

column3: 小主 今夜月色倒好
column6: My Lady, the moon is clear and bright tonight,

column3: 不如取来长相思弹一曲吧
column6: Shall I get Endless Longing, your zither?

column3: 对月弹琴也算是风雅之事
column6: It is an elegant pastime to play the zither to the moon.

However, as Li Bai wrote,
"Endless longing, shatters my heart in ruins."

column3: 小主过去可是最喜欢弹
column6: I’d rather not play it.
The poem Endless Longing used to be your favorite, My Lady.
Even if I like the poem,
I dare not to play it anymore.
You're not playing it on the zither,

column3: 却有谁在用笛子吹长相思呢
column6: but someone is playing it on the flute.
This is the second half of the Endless Longing.
"Endless longing, for the person in Chang'an."
"Her beauty is the blossom behind the clouds."
"Above me, the ink-blue layers of skies;"
"Beneath, the clear waves of Lushui River.”
"My soul is tortured traversing the heavens and the land"
"yet my dreams cannot cross the barricading mountains.”

column3: 浣碧 你听 这笛声多好
column6: Jade, listen...
What beautiful flute playing!
My Lady, what are you talking about?
I don't hear anything.
Don't you?
No, I don't.

column3: 虽然很轻 但是吹得很好呢
column6: The flute playing is light and graceful.

column3: 原来宫中还有人和小主一样

column6:
I didn't know another musician in the palace
admires Endless Longing as much as you, My Lady.
Endless Longing is a sorrowful song.
This flute playing
heightens the sense of longing
but lessens the lament.

column3: 让人觉得相思亦是美好之事
column6: It makes longing appear to be a beautiful feeling.
I wonder which concubine is playing the flute so well.

column3: 你也被那笛声打动了 是不是
column6: You also feel touched by the playing, don't you?

column3: 小主 不如我们出去走走吧
column6: My Lady, why don't we go out to seek the player?

column3: 古人踏雪寻梅是闻梅香而去
column6: The ancient poets followed a fragrance to seek the blooming plums,
now I follow the sound of the flute to find the player.
The sound is as light as a wisp of cloud.
I wonder if I am able to find the player.

column3: 奴婢也想见见那吹笛人的样子
column6: I am also curious to meet the player.
The encounter would be most fortunate.

column3: 找得见最好 找不见就罢了
column6: But if we don't, that's fate.
You've lost weight.
Just as in the season when "the west wind reels the bamboo curtain",

I have become "thinner than the wilting lilies."
[a poem by Li Qingzhao]
Your Lordship saved me in a time of distress.

column3: 本宫铭记于心 感激不尽
column6: I will always remember and appreciate Your Lordship's righteous act.

column3: 莞嫔一定要和小王这样生疏吗
column6: Concubine Sourire, you don't have to be so formal with me.
I am sorry—

column3: 可惜依旧没能保住你的孩子
column6: sorry that it did not save your child.

column3: 果郡王闯入翊坤宫救本宫
column6:
Everyone thinks that Your Lordship entered
the Palace of Earthly Honors

column3: 不过是因为本宫是皇上的宠妃
column6: only because I am a concubine in His Majesty's favor

column3: 救本宫是迎逢皇上罢了
column6: and that Your Lordship saved me to please His Majesty.
But regardless,
in this entire palace,
only Your Lordship extended a hand of justice.
I'm not in a position to repay Your Lordship

column3: 但绝不是忘恩负义之人
column6: but I'm not a person who would ungratefully forget your kindness.
Should anything inconvenience Your Lordship in the future,
I will aid with all I have.

column3: 小王希望莞嫔一切安好
column6: I care about your well-being
because ...
you are someone who understands me.
I know Your Lordship did so for my benefit,

column3: 只是王爷若与我的贴身侍女

column6: but if Your Lordship stays in close contact with my maid,

column3: 若传出去对王爷自身无益
column6: it would be of no benefit to Your Lordship's reputation.
Thank you, Concubine Sourire.

column3: 王爷今晚如何会出现在此处
column6: Why is Your Lordship here tonight?
His Majesty asked me to stay for the night.

column3: 刚刚去向皇兄请安的时候
column6: When I went to pay my respects to him,

column3: 碰到了一位唱歌的安贵人
column6: A Nobel Lady surnamed An was singing inside.
I believe I had met her before.
She was then Attendant An.
Was she?

column3: 安贵人的歌声倒是进益了许多
column6: Her singing has progressed a lot,

column3: 不过缺少了她自己应有的韵味
column6: but... it no longer reflects her own character.

column3: 皇上喜欢才是最重要的 不是吗
column6: That the Emperor likes it is most important,
isn't it?

column3: 璞玉浑金 天然美质
column6:
Raw jade and unpolished gold
are beautiful in their natural texture.
It's more important to be loyal to oneself.

column3: 多情必至寡情 任性终不失性
column6: “Love perishes; One who loves many will love none.

column3: 小王刚刚吹奏的这首长相思
column6: Heart persists; One who indulges their heart will not lose it.”

column3: 希望能为莞嫔略略解忧
column6: I hope my playing of Endless Longing relieved some of your sorrow.
It's just a poem.

column3: 曲通人心 与你是 与我也是
column6: Poetry speaks to the heart
—not only yours, but also mine.

His Majesty probably asked Your Lordship
to stay so he can meet you tomorrow.
I should take my leave.
When did you become close with Lord XVII?
I'm talking to you as your elder sister.

column3: 你愿说就说 不愿说就罢了
column6: You don't need to answer if you aren't willing to.

column3: 我并不是存心要瞒长姐的
column6: Huan, I had no intention to conceal.

column3: 可是从我生辰那日开始的
column6: Was it on my birthday?

column3: 难怪你当时总不让我去湖边散心
column6: You were preventing me from taking a walk near the lake.
